part_system_get_layer: This function can be used to retrieve the unique layer ID value for the given particle system. You supply the particle system ID value (as returned by the function part_system_create_layer()) and the function will return the ID value of the layer.
The particle system ID value to get the layer ID of
Real (unique layer ID value or 0 if the layer is an internally managed one)
The above code will check a particle system to see what layer it is on and if it is not on the given layer it will be changed.
